Name: Oligarchy
Ability: Draw a card. This card grants influence equal to half of the total gold production in your deck.

Name: Monarchy
Ability: Draw a card. This card grants influence equal to the number of Elite cards you have, minus the number of Common cards you have.

Name: Democracy
Ability: This card grants influence equal to the number of Common cards you have, minus the number of Elite cards.

Name: Stratocracy
Ability: This card grants influence equal to the number of Martial cards you have.

Name: Theocracy
Ability: This card grants influence equal to the number of cards you have that grant influence.

Name: Inquisition
Ability: This card grants influence equal to the number of Inflitration cards you have, minus the number of Common cards you have.

Name: Overseer
Ability: Secrets cards you have grant one additional influence each.

Name: Stoneworker's Guild
Ability: Gain gold equal to the number of Craft cards you have in play.

Name: Jeweler's Guild
Ability: This card grants influence equal to the number of Craft cards you have.

Name: Farmer's Guild
Ability: Gain gold equal to the number of Farming cards you have in play.

Name: Lurker
Ability: Gather Information.

Name: Sabotage
Ability: Your opponent discards one random card from their hand.

Name: Assassination
Ability: Look at your opponent's hand. Choose one card for them to discard.

Name: Vaults
Ability: Draw a card and gain two gold.

Name: Taxes
Ability: Add one Season of Tribute to your Seasons deck.

Name: Thieve's Alliance
Ability: Add one Season of Tribute to your Seasons deck. Your opponent may Gather Information.

Name: Jeweler
Ability: Gain gold equal to the number of Elite cards you have in play.

Name: Propaganda
Ability: Draw a card.

Name: Hired Raiders
Ability: Add one Season of Ruin to your opponent's Seasons deck. Your opponent may Gather Information.

Name: Raiding Party
Ability: Your opponent is Attacked for an amount equal to the number of Martial cards in play.

Name: Mercenaries
Ability: Your opponent may discard a card that grants two or more gold to take this card and put it in their discard.

Name: Trade Agreement
Ability: You and your opponent may negotiate a trade of two cards in your discard piles.

Name: Enthraller
Ability: Gain gold equal to the number of Common cards you have in play. Common cards you have give -1 influence.

Name: Ratcatcher
Ability: Your opponent destroys one Secrets card in their discard pile.

Name: Worker's Coalition
Ability: Common cards in play produce one less gold (except this one). This card grants influence equal to the number of Common cards you have.

Name: Steal Draft
Ability: Place a Draft Marker on a card where your opponent has a Draft Marker.

Name: Census
Ability: Look through your deck, keeping it in the same order. You may choose one card from it to discard, and one card to put on top.

Name: Draftsmen
Ability: It costs one less gold to draft cards.

Name: Stockpile
Ability: It costs one less gold to build cards.

Name: Seer
Ability: Look at the top card of your Seasons deck. You may put it on the bottom of the deck.

Name: Increased Efficiency
Ability: Gain gold equal to the gold production of one card in play.

Name: Refuse Sorters
Ability: Add one random card from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Designer
Ability: Add one card to the project row. You may put a draft marker on it.

Name: Secrets
Ability: Draw a card.

Name: Lurker
Ability: Gather Information.

Name: Workers
Ability: You may destroy one Ruin card in your discard pile.

Name: Stoneworker
Ability: Discard a card to gain two gold.
